revised_title: Developmental Stages and Affinities of Balanoglossus Kowalevskii (Agassiz)
tldr: The author investigates the later developmental stages of Balanoglossus Kowalevskii (Agassiz) and examines its affinities within the enteropneusta. The study covers the external changes, internal structure, and the nervous system of the organism, revealing its vertebrate-like characteristics.
